titles.title: The Facilitating Increased Resilience, Environmental Weatherization And Lowered Liability (FIREWALL) Act
The Facilitating Increased Resilience, Environmental Weatherization And Lowered Liability (FIREWALL) Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable credit against tax for disaster mitigation expenditures.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
